description.narrative: The project works with CSOs across the UK that work in partnership with health institutions in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs). The programme strengthens their capacity through a comprehensive capacity development programme, including participatory workshops and online tools and resources. As a result of this project, there will be demonstrable improvements, against quality assured standards, of the capacities participating CSOs. The project will benefit the CSOs, their partners and beneficiaries.

activity-date.narrative: The programme is engaging CSOs in the UK working through health partnerships on a capacity development programme. The programme has taken a holistic approach to guide successful applicants through a process to assess their capacity development needs underpinned by THET’s Principles of Partnership. Training workshops have been conducted and a mentorship scheme has been developed to improve their capacity to deliver quality health partnership projects.
